Description:
The Photographer position will be responsible for creating visual content for the app/web through high-quality images that will best represent the product. In eCommerce, photographers are an integral part of capturing and communicating the company’s visual and commercial identity. This is a highly operational full-time role that includes elements of photography, production efficiency, and quality control. Follow up Boutiqaat objectives and be keen on the organization's mission and vision to inspire suitable ideas. 
Implement plans and execute it referring the competitive and audience interest to enhance levels of audience engagement.  
Oversees brand standards, lighting technique, and image quality. 
Executes standard photography operation procedures including image editing techniques, tools, processes, and guidelines. 
Produce all product related studio photography for the app/web  
Archives images and organizes files. 
Drives towards continuous improvement and creative solutions. 
Provide a clear image of product as per standards and expectations for attracting the customers. 
Enhance the subject’s appearance with natural or artificial light. 
Producing a high-quality image that implies high quality product, creating a good first impression of your brand  
Creating excellent photos that are of high commercial quality and ensuring products are launched online in a timely manner  
Utilizes up-to-date knowledge of product shoot trends and photography/imaging technology to enhance product photo presentation. 
Coming up with innovative and creative ideas for product photoshoots.  
Perform postproduction photo retouching and editing- clean and edit products through Photoshop.  
Deliver products in a timely manner and adhering to given deadlines.  
Keeps equipment up to date, organized, and maintained.  Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in marketing, photography, or art preferred. 
Previous experience in Photography, Product photography, Fashion Photography, ECommerce Photography. 
Excellent portfolio, driven and motivated to create excellent photos that are of high commercial quality.  
Excellent technical knowledge and expertise in Photoshop and other photo editing tools and programs.  
Detailed knowledge of photography art and lighting. 
Strong creative presence and artistic flair. 
Passionate about E-commerce photography with a creative eye with the ability to capture. products in the best way possible through lighting, styling, and composition. 
Able to follow instructions clearly to achieve desired results. 
Able to stand and move around for long periods at a time. 
Flexible to work on different locations as required of the job.
